_meanings:
{@--5@} ({%a%}) Favour, encouragement,
assistance, conciliation; {#sopagrahaM#}  
<ls>K. 156.</ls> ({%b%}) Favourableness, 
kindness, complacence; {#sopagraha#} <ls>K. 264.</ls>

{@--8@} The voice or
pada of a verb.

{@--9@} A pile or heap
of ku≈õa grass.

{@--10@} The presiding
spirit or cause which directs a
planet's motion.

{@--11@} A minor planet
({#rAhu, ketu#} &c.), a secondary 
heavenly body, such as a comet, meteor.
